## Is GitHub Down

> Check if GitHub is down

## Inspired From

- [Sindresorhus's is-github-down](https://github.com/sindresorhus/is-github-down)

## Install

```
$ pip install isgithubdown
```

## Usage

```
$ isgithubdown

 ðŸ˜ž It's down.

$ isgithubdown

 ðŸ˜Š It's up.
```
